sentences.en: All ready to be eaten with pancake syrup and butter. Yum Yum!
sentences.cn: 配上牛油和香饼糖浆,又香又好吃. 太棒了!

sentences.en: For each operation, yum downloads the latest package information from the configured repositories.
sentences.cn: 对于每一次操作, yum会从已配置的仓库下载最后的包信息.

sentences.en: Jeffrey says yum yum yum, when he ate his cake.
sentences.cn: 当他吃蛋糕的时候,弟弟说:啧啧啧!
不行, 嚼嚼! 你这讨厌鬼.
噢, 哇噢! 那是什么?

sentences.en: The panda eats bamboo. Chomp , chomp , chew, yum my bamboo.
sentences.cn: 熊猫吃竹子. 咯, 太美味了, 我的竹子.

sentences.en: This fundamental polarity and its resolution are often expressed through symbols of sexuality ( see yab - yum ).
sentences.cn: 这种极性的基本原理和它的坚定经常是通过性符号来表现出来 ( 参看“双运”(父母尊) ).

sentences.en: Today, the businesses belong to Yum! Restaurants International but remain major PepsiCo customers.
sentences.cn: 今天, 该项业务属于百胜 餐饮 国际,他们现在仍然是百事的主要客户.

sentences.en: Tom yum is characterized by its distinct hot and sour flavors, with fragrant herbs generously used.
sentences.cn: 东阴汤以其独特的酸辣口味著称, 并配以大量浓郁的香料.
好喝, 好喝, 好喝, 好喝!

sentences.en: Yum operates about 3,000 KFC and Pizza Hut restaurants in China.
sentences.cn: 百胜在中国约有3,000家肯德基(KFC)和必胜客门店.

sentences.en: Yum, they make my mouth water.
sentences.cn: 啧, 它们让我的口水都流出来了.

sentences.en: Yum! Then we have school again.
sentences.cn: 真好吃! 然后咱们再上课.

sentences.en: Yum! Will you bring some back for me?
sentences.cn: 太好了! 你能给我带些水果回来 吗 ?

trans.tran_cn: 极好的，妙的，美味的，滋味好的
